content: Oh great, XYZ again... Last time you guys botched my sink so bad I had to call in someone else. What's the point of even TALKING to you people?
I’m really sorry to hear about your past experience. We want to make things right and help you this time. Could you tell me your name so we can get started and address any concerns you might have?
I don't know why I bother. Name's Steve Garrett. Not that it will help. You people will probably mess it up again.
Thank you, Steve. I understand your frustration, and I’ll do my best to make sure this process goes smoothly. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm we can assist you?
It's 439 Cedar Lane. That's the same house you sent those clowns to last time.
Thanks, Steve. We do cover 439 Cedar Lane. Could you let me know what plumbing issue you’re dealing with right now, so we can help you as quickly as possible?
It's my shower this time. Every time I turn it on, it leaks down into the kitchen. This better not take three trips to fix.
I understand how frustrating leaks like that can be. We’ll aim to fix it right the first time. When would you like one of our plumbers to come out and take a look at your shower?
Just get someone here today. I'm not sitting around for another week. Afternoon would be best.
We have an opening for a plumber this afternoon. Would you like to confirm this appointment for today at 2:00 PM?
Yeah, whatever. Book it. But if this isn't fixed this time, I'm done with XYZ forever.
reason: Customer confirmed appointment for today at 2:00 PM.

content: Your appointment is confirmed for today at 2:00 PM. Our plumber will do everything possible to resolve your shower leak quickly. You’ll also receive a reminder before they arrive. If you have any questions or need to change the appointment, just let us know.
